name: Mini-sh World
description:
Mini-sh World is a side scrolling adventure game about defending your home and the other Mini-sh from the dangers lurking in the house. Armed with your trusty paperclip, nothing but the dust bunnies can stop you from defeating the 4 bosses and saving your species.

===========================

Source code: https://github.com/Durveg/Mini-shWorld

===========================

Instructions:

- Defeat the 4 bosses to win.

- WASD (or arrows) to move.

- Space to jump.

- LeftShift to attack.

- E to drop a bomb.

===========================

Made in 48-hours for Ludum Dare Compo 38 by Durveg.

Tools:

- Unity

- Photoshop

- Illustrator

- CFXR

Libraries:

- A* Pathfinding Project

===========================
